channel.title: [PI] 602 GFX and Anims [/PI]

item.title: [PI] 602 GFX and Anims [/PI]
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

Alright, so i’ve eliminated almost all the error’s ive had, and gotten down to this one.

Problem: Error with this code snippet.
When: Trying to add 602 Anim’s + GFX from this tut:
Link to Tutorial

It’s some where in this code:

public static Class36 method531(int j) { if(animationlist == null) { return null; } else { String hex = Integer.toHexString(j); int file = Integer.parseInt(hex.substring(0,(hex.length()-4)), 16); int frame = Integer.parseInt(hex.substring((hex.length()-4)), 16); if(animationlist[file].length == 0) { load(file); } return animationlist[file][frame]; } }

down at the bottom with theL

load(file);
I’ve tried taking that statement and putting it like:

    public static Class36 method531(int j)
    {
                if(animationlist == null) {
                        return null;
				} else { 
						String hex = Integer.toHexString(j);
						int file = Integer.parseInt(hex.substring(0,(hex.length()-4)), 16);
						int frame = Integer.parseInt(hex.substring((hex.length()-4)), 16);
                        load(file);
						return animationlist[file][frame];
				}
		}

And i’m pretty sure its some where in this coding.
No matter what i do it just doesn’t load the model’s, i think something is wrong with the Hex, or something.

Read full topic
